EmailTemplate.subject: Assessment for Youth Assessors - Sign Up Now!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hey {!Contact.FirstName},
Here is an overview of the up-and-coming assessments available for you to attend over the next few weeks. Do send an email to promila-melia.kapoor@the-challenge.org with your preferred dates and she will reserve you a space.
Its really great having you involved and already Youth Assessors have ensured we are only hiring the very best staff to work on the NCS programme in 2016!
Sunday 13th of March Mentor Assessment between 13:45 and 18:00
Monday 14th of March Leader Assessment between 10:45 and 13:00
Monday 14th of March Mentor Assessment between 16:00 and 18:00
Tuesday 15th of March Leader Assessment between 15:45 and 18:00
Friday 18th of March Mentor Assessment between 10:45 and 13:00
Saturday 19th of March Leader Assessment between 09:00 and 13:00
Monday 21st of March Mentor Assessment between 10:45 and 13:00
Tuesday 22nd of March Leader Assessment between 15:45 and 18:00
Thursday 24th of March Mentor Assessment between 10:45 and 13:00
All assessments are taking place at Tower Building, Elizabeth House, 39 York Road, London, SE1 7NQ.
Once you have signed up you will receive a call or an email from a staffing lead to check you have all the information.
Look forward to having you involved!!
From Rhiannon and Promila
